attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister that, to protect the populace from malpractice, he legislates to ensure that, throughout the civil engineering and building industries, the practice and title of "Builder" be limited to those companies and individuals qualified and registered with a grade of technical qualification issued and monitored by a nationally recognised govermental or legally registered Ombudsman or construction industry Quality Control body.
